cause.description:
The Global Fund for Women advocates for and defends women's human rights by making grants to support women's groups.
We support a wide range of women’s groups working to build peace and end gender-based violence, advance health and sexual and reproductive rights, ensure economic and environmental justice, expand civic and political participation, increase access to education, and foster social change philanthropy.
cause.mission: Largest global grantmaker focused exclusively on women's rights. Seeding, strengthening & linking.
cause.name: Global Fund for Women - Supporting International Women's Rights
